query.hana: SELECT "Code" AS "IdDepartamento","Name" AS "Nombre" FROM OCST WHERE "Country" = '{0}'
SELECT "Code" AS "IdDepartamento","Name" AS "Nombre" FROM OCST WHERE "Country" = '{0}' and CAST("Code" AS INT) = '{1}'
SELECT "Code" as "IdProvincia","U_CQ_NPRO" AS "Nombre","U_CQ_CDEP" AS "IdDepartamento" FROM "@CQ_PROVINCIA" WHERE "U_CQ_CDEP" = '{0}'
SELECT "Code" as "Ubigeo","U_CQ_NDIS" as "Nombre","U_CQ_CPROV" as "IdProvincia" FROM "@CQ_DIST" WHERE "U_CQ_CPROV" = '{0}'

SELECT T1."Code" AS "IdDepartamento",T1."Name" AS "Departamento",T2."Code" AS "IdProvincia",T2."U_CQ_NPRO" AS "Provincia",T3."Code" AS "Ubigeo",T3."U_CQ_NDIS" AS "Distrito" FROM "OCST" T1 INNER JOIN "@CQ_PROVINCIA" T2 ON T2."U_CQ_CDEP" = T1."Code" INNER JOIN "@CQ_DIST" T3 ON T3."U_CQ_CPROV" = T2."Code" WHERE T1."Country" = 'PE' AND {0} LIKE '%{1}%';

SELECT DISTINCT T0."U_CQ_CDEP" AS "IdDepartamento",T0."U_CQ_NDEP" as "Departamento",T1."Code" as "IdProvincia",T1."U_CQ_NPRO" as "Provincia", T2."Code" AS "Ubigeo", T2."U_CQ_NDIS" as "Distrito" FROM "@CQ_PROVINCIA" T0 INNER JOIN "@CQ_PROVINCIA" T1 ON T1."U_CQ_NDEP" = T0."U_CQ_NDEP" INNER JOIN "@CQ_DIST" T2 ON T2."U_CQ_NPROV" = T1."U_CQ_NPRO" WHERE {0} LIKE '%{1}%';

SELECT T1."Code" AS "IdDepartamento",T1."Name" AS "Departamento",T2."Code" AS "IdProvincia",T2."U_CQ_NPRO" AS "Provincia",T3."Code" AS "Ubigeo" ,T3."U_CQ_NDIS" AS "Distrito" FROM "OCST" T1 INNER JOIN "@CQ_PROVINCIA" T2 ON T2."U_CQ_CDEP" = T1."Code" INNER JOIN "@CQ_DIST" T3 ON T3."U_CQ_CPROV" = T2."Code" WHERE T1."Country" = 'PE' AND T3."Code" = '{0}'

SELECT DISTINCT T0."U_CQ_CDEP" AS "IdDepartamento",T0."U_CQ_NDEP" as "Departamento",T1."Code" as "IdProvincia",T1."U_CQ_NPRO" as "Provincia", T2."Code" AS "Ubigeo", T2."U_CQ_NDIS" as "Distrito" FROM "@CQ_PROVINCIA" T0 INNER JOIN "@CQ_PROVINCIA" T1 ON T1."U_CQ_NDEP" = T0."U_CQ_NDEP" INNER JOIN "@CQ_DIST" T2 ON T2."U_CQ_NPROV" = T1."U_CQ_NPRO" WHERE T2."Code" = '{0}'
SELECT T0."CostCenter" FROM OHEM T0 WHERE T0."empID" = '{0}'
SELECT "IndexID" AS "Id","FldValue" AS "Nombre","Descr" AS "Descripcion" FROM "UFD1" WHERE "TableID" = 'OPRQ' and "FieldID" = '{0}'
SELECT "IndexID" AS "Id","FldValue" AS "Nombre","Descr" AS "Descripcion" FROM "UFD1" WHERE "TableID" = 'OPRQ' and "FieldID" = '{0}' and "FldValue" = '{1}'
SELECT DISTINCT T0."U_BPP_TDTD" as "id",T0."U_BPP_TDDD" as "name" FROM "@BPP_TPODOC" T0 INNER JOIN "@BPP_TIPOXFORM" T1 ON T0."U_BPP_TDTD" = T1."U_BPP_Tipo" WHERE T1."U_BPP_Form" = '141'

SELECT DISTINCT T0."U_BPP_TDTD" as "id",T0."U_BPP_TDDD" as "name" FROM "@BPP_TPODOC" T0 INNER JOIN "@BPP_TIPOXFORM" T1 ON T0."U_BPP_TDTD" = T1."U_BPP_Tipo" WHERE T1."U_BPP_Form" = '141' AND T0."U_BPP_TDTD" = '{0}'
SELECT * FROM "STR_WEB_DOC" WHERE "STR_RD_ID" = '{0}' ORDER BY "STR_FECHA_DOC" DESC

insert into OPRQ_NUMEAR(DOCENTRY,SEDE,TIPO,NUMEROEAR) select "DocEntry","fax", "U_STR_TIPOEAR", (select IFNULL(MAX(NUMEROEAR),0)+1 from OPRQ_NUMEAR where "SEDE" = T1."fax" and "TIPO" = T0."U_STR_TIPOEAR") from OPRQ T0 inner join OHEM T1 on T0."Requester" = trim(T1."empID") where (select 'Y' from NNM1 where "ObjectCode" = '1470000113' and "Series" = T0."Series" and "SeriesName" like '%EAR%') = 'Y' and T0."DocEntry" = '{0}';

SELECT T0."DocEntry" AS "ID",T0."DocEntry" AS "STR_DOCENTRY",T0."DocNum" AS "STR_NRSOLICITUD", null AS "STR_NRRENDICION", '6' AS "STR_ESTADO", T0."Comments" AS "STR_MOTIVO", T1."Code" AS "STR_UBIGEO", T0."U_STR_TIPORUTA" AS "STR_RUTA", NULL AS "STR_RUTAANEXO", T0."U_CE_MNDA" AS "STR_MONEDA", T0."U_STR_TIPOEAR" AS "STR_TIPORENDICION", T0."DocTotal" AS "STR_TOTALSOLICITADO", NULL AS "STR_MOTIVOMIGR", T0."Requester" AS "STR_EMPLDASIG",T0."Requester" AS "STR_EMPLDREGI",T0."DocDate" AS "STR_FECHAREGIS", T0."U_FECINI" AS "STR_FECHAINI",T0."U_FECFIN" AS "STR_FECHAFIN", T0."DocDueDate" AS "STR_FECHAVENC", 'N' AS "STR_ORDENVIAJE", NULL AS "STR_AREA" FROM OPRQ T0 LEFT JOIN "@CQ_DIST" T1 ON T1."U_CQ_NDIS" = T0."U_PROVINCIA" WHERE T0."DocEntry" = '{0}'

SELECT "LineNum" as "ID",CAST("Quantity" AS INT) as "STR_CANTIDAD", "Dscription" AS "STR_CONCEPTO", "ItemCode" AS "STR_CODARTICULO","U_CNCUP" AS "STR_CUP","OcrCode2" "STR_POSFINAN", CAST("LineTotal" AS DOUBLE) as "STR_TOTAL", '0' AS "SR_ID", "OcrCode" "STR_CECO", "AcctCode" "STR_CTC" FROM PRQ1 WHERE "DocEntry" = '{0}'
SELECT TOP 1 ID FROM STR_WEB_SR_DET ORDER BY ID DESC

UPDATE "STR_WEB_DOC" SET STR_RENDICION = '{0}', STR_FECHA_CONTABILIZA = '{1}',STR_FECHA_DOC = '{2}',STR_FECHA_VENCIMIENTO = '{3}',STR_PROVEEDOR = '{4}',STR_RUC = '{5}',STR_TIPO_AGENTE = '{6}',STR_MONEDA = '{7}',STR_COMENTARIOS = '{8}',STR_TIPO_DOC = '{9}',STR_SERIE_DOC = '{10}',STR_CORR_DOC = '{11}',STR_VALIDA_SUNAT = '{12}',STR_ANEXO_ADJUNTO = '{13}',STR_OPERACION = '{14}',STR_PARTIDAFLUJO = '{15}',STR_TOTALDOC = '{16}',STR_RAZONSOCIAL = '{17}' WHERE ID = '{18}'
UPDATE "STR_WEB_RD" SET "STR_TOTALRENDIDO" = (SELECT IFNULL(SUM("STR_TOTALDOC"),'0.0') FROM "STR_WEB_DOC" WHERE "STR_RD_ID" = '{0}') WHERE "ID" = '{1}'
UPDATE "STR_WEB_DOC" SET "STR_TOTALDOC" = (SELECT IFNULL(SUM("STR_SUBTOTAL"),'0.0') FROM "STR_WEB_DOC_DET" WHERE "STR_DOC_ID" = '{0}') WHERE "ID" = '{1}'

SELECT T0."STR_ID_SR" "ID_SR",T1."empID" "Aprobador Id",T1."firstName"||' '||T1."lastName" as "Nombre Autorizador",T1."email" "Email Aprobador",T0."APROBACIONFINALIZADA" "Finalizado",T3."empID" as "Empleado Id" , T3."firstName"||' '||T1."lastName" AS "Nombre Empleado",T4."STR_FECHAREGIS",T4."STR_ESTADO" "Estado"FROM "STR_WEB_APR_SR" T0 INNER JOIN OHEM T1 ON T1."empID" = T0."STR_USUARIOAPROBADORID"INNER JOIN OHEM T3 ON T3."empID" = T0."STR_USUARIOID" INNER JOIN "STR_WEB_SR" T4 ON T4."ID" = T0."STR_ID_SR" WHERE T0."STR_ID_SR" = '{0}'

SELECT DISTINCT T0."STR_ID_SR" "ID_SR",T1."empID" "Aprobador Id",T1."firstName"||' '||T1."lastName" as "Nombre Autorizador",T1."email" "Email Aprobador",T0."APROBACIONFINALIZADA" "Finalizado",T3."empID" as "Empleado Id" , T3."firstName"||' '||T1."lastName" AS "Nombre Empleado",T2."STR_FECHAREGIS",T2."STR_ESTADO" "Estado",T1."branch" AS "Area" FROM "STR_WEB_APR_SR" T0 INNER JOIN OHEM T1 ON T1."branch" = "STR_AREA" INNER JOIN "STR_WEB_SR" T2 ON T2."ID" = T0."STR_ID_SR" INNER JOIN OHEM T3 ON T3."empID" = T0."STR_USUARIOID" WHERE T1."U_STR_TIPO_USUARIO" = '{0}' AND T2."ID" = '{1}' AND T0."APROBACIONFINALIZADA" = '{2}'
SELECT * FROM STR_WEB_APR_SR WHERE STR_ID_SR = '' AND STR_AREA = '' AND APROBACIONFINALZIADA = ''

SELECT DISTINCT T0."STR_ID_RD" "ID_SR",T1."branch" AS "Area", T1."empID" "Aprobador Id",T1."firstName"||' '||T1."lastName" as "Nombre Autorizador",T1."email" "Email Aprobador",T0."APROBACIONFINALIZADA" "Finalizado",T3."empID" as "Empleado Id" , T3."firstName"||' '||T1."lastName" AS "Nombre Empleado",T2."STR_FECHAREGIS",T2."STR_ESTADO" "Estado" FROM "STR_WEB_APR_RD" T0 INNER JOIN OHEM T1 ON T1."branch" = "STR_AREA" INNER JOIN "STR_WEB_RD" T2 ON T2."ID" = T0."STR_ID_RD" INNER JOIN OHEM T3 ON T3."empID" = T0."STR_USUARIOID" WHERE T1."U_STR_TIPO_USUARIO" = '{0}' AND T2."ID" = '{1}' AND T0."APROBACIONFINALIZADA" = '{2}'
SELECT TOP 1 "ID" As "Id" FROM "STR_WEB_SR" WHERE "STR_EMPLDREGI" = {0} ORDER BY "ID" DESC
SELECT TOP 1 "ID" As "Id" FROM "STR_WEB_DOC" WHERE "STR_RD_ID" = {0} ORDER BY "ID" DESC

SELECT T0."ItemCode" as "id", T0."ItemName" as "name",CT."OverCode2" AS "posFinanciera", CT."AcctCode" AS "CTA" FROM OITM T0 inner join OITW T1 on T1."ItemCode"=T0."ItemCode" inner join OACT CT on CT."AcctCode"=T1."ExpensesAc" WHERE T0."ItemCode" = '{0}' GROUP BY T0."ItemCode", T0."ItemName",CT."OverCode2",CT."AcctCode"
SELECT "PrjCode" as "id","PrjName" as "name" FROM OPRJ WHERE "Active" = 'Y'
SELECT "PrjCode" as "id","PrjName" as "name" FROM OPRJ WHERE "Active" = 'Y' AND "PrjCode" = '{0}'
SELECT "Code" as "id","Name" as "name" FROM OSTA WHERE "Code" = '{0}'

SELECT DISTINCT T1."firstName" || ' ' || T1."lastName" AS "Nombres",T0."STR_USUARIOAPROBADORID",T0."APROBACIONFINALIZADA",T0."FECHAAPROBACION",T0."STR_AREA" FROM "STR_WEB_APR_SR" T0 LEFT JOIN OHEM T1 ON T0."STR_USUARIOAPROBADORID" = T1."empID" WHERE T0."STR_ID_SR" = '{0}'
SELECT "empID","firstName" ||' '||"lastName" AS "lastName" FROM OHEM WHERE "U_STR_TIPO_USUARIO" = 2 AND "branch" = '{0}'

SELECT DISTINCT T1."firstName" || ' ' || T1."lastName" AS "Nombres",T0."STR_USUARIOAPROBADORID",T0."APROBACIONFINALIZADA",T0."FECHAAPROBACION",T0."STR_AREA" FROM "STR_WEB_APR_RD" T0 LEFT JOIN OHEM T1 ON T0."STR_USUARIOAPROBADORID" = T1."empID" WHERE T0."STR_ID_RD" = '{0}'
SELECT "empID","firstName" ||' '||"lastName" AS "lastName" FROM OHEM WHERE "U_STR_TIPO_USUARIO" IN(2,3) AND "branch" = '{0}'
SELECT T0."U_CUP", T0."U_DESCRIPTION", T0."U_COSTCENTER_ID" AS "CRP", T0."U_HEADING_ID" AS "Partida" FROM "@STR_BGT_NBOX" T0 WHERE T0."U_CUP" = '{0}'
SELECT TOP 1 IFNULL("Code",0) + 1 "Code" FROM "@STR_WEB_TTPEND" ORDER BY CAST("Code" AS INT) DESC
SELECT TOP 1 "Series" FROM NNM1 WHERE "Indicator" = '{0}' AND "ObjectCode" = '1470000113' AND"SeriesName" LIKE '%{1}%'
